snippet.title: PEPPERED: an existential platformer TRAILER
snippet.description:
Releasing April 7th on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1883370/PEPPERED_an_existential_platformer/

PEPPERED is a narrative platformer where you only have one shot at everything.

Every choice, every boss battle, and every failure impact the branching plotline and determine how the story will go and how it will end. Explore a pixel world, fight bosses, solve dumb puzzles, make decisions, and discover multiple endings. 

Try to save the world and fail.
